Data Fields

STRING * strTag

 Pointer to a list of sub tags.
LIST * psAttribList
 Pointer to a list of tag attributes.

Detailed Description

Definition of a XML parameter.

Each parameter (tag) found in a XML file is represented by this structure. Use the XMLPAR_create function for creation of a new XML parameter.
